Title: fslogix printing does not work after changing profile from UPM to fslogix
Description: I use Manuel Winkel's script to convert UPM profiles to FSLogix profiles. Which users then encounter the problem that they can no longer print? Deleting printers from the registry and restarting the printer queue does not help. If I then create a new profile for the employees, they can print. Equipment: Windows 2019, Citrix 7 2203 CU6, FSLogix 3.25.626.21064
Author: JanO
EnhancedContent: I use Manuel Winkel's script <www.deyda.net> to convert UPM profiles to FSLogix profiles. Which users then encounter the problem that they can no longer print? Deleting printers from the registry and restarting the printer queue does not help. If I then create a new profile for the employees, they can print. Equipment: Windows 2019, Citrix 7 2203 CU6, FSLogix 3.25.626.21064
